AuthenticateAdminFilter
Whenever a HTTP request want to get to a Servlet, it has to go through this authentication filter first This filter will check for your JWT Token to check if you are actually logged in or not.

Whenever a HTTP request want to get to a Servlet, it has to go through this authentication filter first This filter will check for your JWT Token to check if you are actually logged in or not.

DataRepository
This DataRepository interface is the one that Services will interact with instead of a concrete database implementation, this way we can swap out Postgre and use MySql, or cloud service , or even txt file

this is just a helper class for all things related to connecting to database
